price: 72. He (Khidr) said: "Did I not tell you, that you would not be able to have patience with me?"
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُلۡ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
